Articles.Content:
can someone please fix this SSTO to go to orbit please?

thanks in advanced

download: http://www./?bgo2z7if4niizpg

I'll take a look at it ,

*update*

Well, you have some issues.

First off is the thrust to weight ratio, 2 jets won't bring up a 30 ton plane.

Same with the nuclear engines, while they may have an awesome isp, they weigh twice as much as conventional liquid fuel engines and have 1/4 the thrust.

Then comes the aerodynamics, your plane is basically one big flying doublewing, you may want to seperate the wings into a middle set of wings with vertical and horizontal stabilizers in the rear, or a rear set of wings with vertical stabilizers and then place horizontal stabilizers in the front, currently your plane is quite prone to stalling (due to the low speed).

Hope that helps!

Edited June 8, 2013 by Neotician
Not sure if you noticed, but i updated my last post
